full_summary:
=================

**Tender:** John Deere Loader Backhoe Attachments

**Reference Number:** WS3641382993-Doc3650800478
**Publication Date:** October 20, 2022
**Tender Closing Date:** November 4, 2022, at 14:00:00

**Contract Information:**

*   **Contract Type:** Directed Contract (Contrat prescrit)
*   **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding (Concurrentielle - Invitation ouverte à soumissionner)
*   **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price (Prix le plus bas)
*   **Limited Tendering Reason:** Exclusive Rights (Droits exclusifs)
*   **End User Entity:** Parks Canada Agency (Agence Parcs Canada)

**Contract Details:**

*   **Scheduled Start Date:** September 23, 2022
*   **Scheduled End Date:** November 30, 2023
*   **Region of Delivery:** Fort Smith
*   **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (Accord de libre-échange canadien)

**Contracting Entity:**

*   **Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)**
*   **Address:** 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, Canada K1A 0S5
*   **Contact:** Godlean Nweke (SPAC/PSPC)
*   **Email:** ¬godlean.nweke@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
*   **Phone:** Not specified

**Notice Status:**
The tender has been cancelled.


This tender is for purchasing various John Deere Loader/Backhoe attachments to meet the needs of the Parks Canada Agency. The attachments are for heavy equipment components (composants d'engins lourds). The contract will be a directed contract, and the selection criteria will be based on lowest price. If you want to provoke further discussion, bugs or have general ideas regarding previous “as is” compose edit you can do so in this same thread –  just leave a comment below.
